title: Oasi Zegna
text:
The Oasi Zegna is a natural area in the <a href="Province%20of%20Biella">Province of Biella</a>, <a href="Piedmont">Piedmont</a>, Italy. It was created by the entrepreneur <a href="Ermenegildo%20Zegna%20%28fashion%20entrepreneur%29">Ermenegildo Zegna</a>, founder of the factory of the <a href="Ermenegildo%20Zegna">same name</a> in <a href="Trivero">Trivero</a>, who wanted to give his village infrastructures and parks. He also created tourist attractions, such as ski slopes and the "Panoramica Zegna", a panoramic road.
History.
The Zegna family founded Oasi Zegna in 1993 as a nature park.
Environmental education.
The project Oasi Zegna aims to develop the environmental education, especially for young people.
Since its creation, the Oasi Zegna has cooperated with international organizations like TEMA, a <a href="Turkey">Turkish</a> organisation against <a href="desertification">desertification</a>, <a href="World%20Wide%20Fund%20for%20Nature">WWF</a> in China, RFA (Rain Forest Alliance), MGF (Moanalua Garden Foundation), AOC (American Ocean Campaign) and <a href="Environmental%20Media%20Association">EMA</a> (Environmental Media Association) in United States.
In cooperation with EMA, the Oasi Zegna gave prizes to showbusiness personalities such as <a href="Sting%20%28musician%29">Sting</a>, <a href="Trudi%20Styler">Trudi Styler</a>, <a href="John%20Travolta">John Travolta</a>, <a href="Ted%20Danson">Ted Danson</a> and <a href="Olivia%20Newton-John">Olivia Newton-John</a> because of their ecological commitment. In 2001 with AOC, the Oasi gave a prize to <a href="Bill%20Clinton">Bill Clinton</a>.
The Oasi also collaborates with the <a href="Fondo%20per%20l%27Ambiente%20Italiano">Fondo per l'Ambiente Italiano</a> and the <a href="Museo%20Civico%20di%20Storia%20Naturale%20di%20Milano">Museo Civico di Storia Naturale di Milano</a>.
Ecomuseum and interesting sites.
The Oasi Zegna is member of the "Biellese territory <a href="ecomuseum">ecomuseum</a>" in order to preserve the pastoral and mountain tradition like <a href="beekeeping">beekeeping</a>.

The Oasi's ski area, founded in 1957, is located in Bielmonte.
